title: Soviet Students rock and blue jeans 9_6 MCQ 1

content.question: The letter above could best be used to illustrate which of the following aspects of the historical context of the late twentieth century?

choices.label: The repressive nature of the Soviet communist regime
The role of communist ideology in the development of anti-consumerist youth movements
The globalization of consumer culture despite the rivalries of the Cold War
The declining quality of Soviet higher education and Soviet universities

content.answer: The globalization of consumer culture despite the rivalries of the Cold War

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
